Interface ApplicationMessage

extends Loggable

Interface implemented by various application-protocol classes.

Method Summary

          Returns the byte-length of the message header.

          Returns the total byte-length of the message including the message header.

Methods inherited from interface org.js4ms.util.logging.Loggable
getLogger, log
 

Method Detail

getHeaderLength

int getHeaderLength()
Returns the byte-length of the message header. For fixed-size messages, this is often the same value as the returned from getTotalLength().

getTotalLength

int getTotalLength()
Returns the total byte-length of the message including the message header.

writeTo

void writeTo(ByteBuffer buffer)
Writes the message to a byte buffer. This method will advance the ByteBuffer position by an amount equal to the total length of the message.

Parameters:
buffer - The destination ByteBuffer.
